animeDescription: Ikkyu is a little boy training to be a monk at Ankokuji Temple. Known for being mischievous and a bit of a troublemaker, but also extremely smart, Ikkyu constantly thinks of new ways to outwit his frustrated teachers, helping others at the same time.
animeRelated: ['Ikkyuu-san to Yancha Hime', 'Ikkyuu-san: Haru Da! Yancha Hime', 'Ikkyuu-san: Ooabare Yancha-hime', 'Congming de Yixiu Zhi Fan Dou Gongzhu']
